logic.equipment

Interface Weapon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Equipment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeaponDecorator, WeaponDecoratorBurning, WeaponDecoratorFreezing, WeaponDecoratorFrightening, WeaponDecoratorPacifying, WeaponDecoratorSlaying, WeaponSolid

    public interface Weapon
extends Equipment
    Version:
    0.3 The class is an interface of Weapon, which extends Equipment. This class equals to the Component Class in the Decorators model.
    Author:
    Kai QI
